AAT = TargetType:New{classname = "cis_hover_aat", killLimit = 5, icon = nil}
AAT.OnDestroy = function(self, objectPtr)
AAT_count = 5
AAT_count = AAT_count - 1
AGRO = TargetType:New{classname = "geo_inf_agro_geonosian", killLimit = 1}
AGRO_count = 1
AICanCaptureCP ("CP4Camp", AMB, false)
AICanCaptureCP("BazaarCamp", AMS, false)
AICanCaptureCP("BazaarCamp", AMS, true)
AICanCaptureCP("BazaarCamp", ATT, false)
AICanCaptureCP("BazaarCamp", ATT, true)
AICanCaptureCP("BazaarCamp", DEF, false)
AICanCaptureCP("BazaarCamp", DEF, true)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP1", 5, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP1", 6, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP1", 7, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP1", DEF, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP2", 5, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP2", 6, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP2", 7, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP2", ATT, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP2", DEF, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP3", 1, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP3", 2, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP3", DEF, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP4", 1, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP4", 2, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP4", DEF, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP5", 1, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP5", 2, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP5", ATT, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CAM_CP5", DEF, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CP1", 5, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CP1", DEF, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CP1", GAR, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CP2", ATT, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CP2", GAR, false)
AICanCaptureCP("CP2", WookieTeam, false)

ifs_mp_gameopts = NewIFShellScreen {
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.bAutoAssignTeams = not ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.bAutoAssignTeams
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.bHeroesEnabled = not ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.bHeroesEnabled
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.bShowNames = not ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.bShowNames
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iAutoAim = 100 - ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iAutoAim
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iDifficulty = 1
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iDifficulty = 3
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iDifficulty = ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iDifficulty + 1
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iDifficulty = ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iDifficulty - 1
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumBots  = 0
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumBots  = bot_max
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumBots = ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumBots + 1
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumBots = ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumBots - 1
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumBots = math.min(ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumBots,ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iMaxBots)
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumBots = math.min(ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumBots,ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iMaxDedicatedBots)
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumPlayers = ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumPlayers + 1
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumPlayers = ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumPlayers - 1
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumPlayers = math.min(ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumPlayers,ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iMaxDedicatedPlayers)
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumPlayers = math.min(ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumPlayers,ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iMaxPlayers)
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumPlayers = player_max
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumPlayers = player_min
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iStartCnt = 0
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iStartCnt = ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iNumPlayers
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iStartCnt = ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iStartCnt + 1
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iStartCnt = ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iStartCnt - 1
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iTeamDmg = 100 - ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iTeamDmg
ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iVoiceMode = ifs_mp_gameopts.Prefs.iVoiceMode + 1

this.Prefs.iNumBots    = math.min(this.Prefs.iNumBots,this.Prefs.iMaxDedicatedBots)
this.Prefs.iNumBots = 0
this.Prefs.iNumBots = math.max(0,this.Prefs.iNumBots - 10)
this.Prefs.iNumBots = math.min(this.Prefs.iNumBots+10,this.Prefs.iMaxBots)
this.Prefs.iNumBots = math.min(this.Prefs.iNumBots+10,this.Prefs.iMaxDedicatedBots)
this.Prefs.iNumBots = this.Prefs.iMaxBots
this.Prefs.iNumBots = this.Prefs.iNumBots + 1
this.Prefs.iNumBots = this.Prefs.iNumBots - 1
this.Prefs.iNumBots =this.Prefs.iMaxBots
this.Prefs.iNumBots =this.Prefs.iMaxDedicatedBots
this.Prefs.iNumPlayers = math.max(2, ScriptCB_GetNumCameras())
this.Prefs.iNumPlayers = math.max(2, ScriptCB_GetNumCameras());
this.Prefs.iNumPlayers = math.max(this.Prefs.iNumPlayers , ScriptCB_GetNumCameras())
this.Prefs.iNumPlayers = math.min(this.Prefs.iNumPlayers+10,this.Prefs.iMaxDedicatedPlayers)
this.Prefs.iNumPlayers = math.min(this.Prefs.iNumPlayers+10,this.Prefs.iMaxPlayers)
this.Prefs.iNumPlayers = math.min(this.Prefs.iNumPlayers,this.Prefs.iMaxDedicatedPlayers)
this.Prefs.iNumPlayers = math.min(this.Prefs.iNumPlayers,this.Prefs.iMaxPlayers)
this.Prefs.iNumPlayers = this.Prefs.iMaxDedicatedPlayers
this.Prefs.iNumPlayers = this.Prefs.iMaxPlayers
this.Prefs.iNumPlayers = this.Prefs.iNumPlayers + 1
this.Prefs.iNumPlayers = this.Prefs.iNumPlayers - 10;
this.Prefs.iNumPlayers= this.Prefs.iNumPlayers - 1
this.Prefs.iStartCnt = math.max(0,this.Prefs.iStartCnt - 1)
this.Prefs.iStartCnt = math.min(this.Prefs.iNumPlayers,this.Prefs.iStartCnt + 1)
this.Prefs.iStartCnt = math.min(this.Prefs.iNumPlayers,this.Prefs.iStartCnt)
this.Prefs.iTeamDmg = 100 - this.Prefs.iTeamDmg
this.Prefs.iVictoryCredits = Clamp(this.Prefs.iVictoryCredits + 10 * iAdjust,
this.Prefs.iVictoryTurn = Clamp(this.Prefs.iVictoryTurn + iAdjust,
this.Prefs.iVictoryType = Clamp(this.Prefs.iVictoryType + iAdjust, 1, 4)
this.Prefs.iVoiceMode  = math.min(this.Prefs.iVoiceMode, this.Prefs.iVoiceModeDedicatedMax)
this.Prefs.iVoiceMode  = math.min(this.Prefs.iVoiceMode, this.Prefs.iVoiceModeMax)
this.Prefs.iVoiceMode = this.Prefs.iVoiceMode + 1
this.Prefs.iVoiceMode = this.Prefs.iVoiceMode - 1
this.Prefs.iVoiceMode = this.Prefs.iVoiceModeDedicatedMax
this.Prefs.iVoiceMode = this.Prefs.iVoiceModeMax
this.Prefs.iVoiceMode = this.Prefs.iVoiceModeMin
this.Prefs.iVoiceMode > this.Prefs.iVoiceModeDedicatedMax) or
this.Prefs.iVoiceMode > this.Prefs.iVoiceModeMax) then
this.Prefs.iVote = math.max( this.Prefs.iVoteMin, this.Prefs.iVote - 25 )
this.Prefs.iVote = math.min( this.Prefs.iVoteMax, this.Prefs.iVote + 25 )
this.Prefs.iVote = this.Prefs.iVoteMax
this.Prefs.iVote = this.Prefs.iVoteMin
this.Prefs.iVoteMax = 75
this.Prefs.iVoteMin = 0
this.Prefs.iWarmUp = math.max( this.Prefs.iWarmUpMin, this.Prefs.iWarmUp - 10 )
this.Prefs.iWarmUp = math.max( this.Prefs.iWarmUpMin, this.Prefs.iWarmUp - 30 )
this.Prefs.iWarmUp = math.min( this.Prefs.iWarmUpMax, this.Prefs.iWarmUp + 10 )
this.Prefs.iWarmUp = math.min( this.Prefs.iWarmUpMax, this.Prefs.iWarmUp + 30 )
this.Prefs.iWarmUp = this.Prefs.iWarmUpMax
